name: AssistanceWithEndOfLifePlanningHCPCS
title: Assistance with End of Life Planning (HCPCS)
description: This value set contains HCPCS and CPT II codes attesting to provision of assistance with advance directives or end of life care planning and decisions.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains HCPCS and CPT II codes attesting to provision of assistance with advance directives or end of life care planning and decisions.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people diagnosed with migraine. This element may map to "Diagnosis" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes HCPCS and CPT II attestation codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)

concept.display: Counseling provided on symptom management, end of life decisions, and palliation (dem)
Patient offered assistance in planning for end of life issues (als)
Patient offered assistance with end of life issues during the measurement period

Counseling and discussion regarding advance directives or end of life care planning and decisions, with patient and/or surrogate (list separately in addition to code for appropriate evaluation and management service)

contains.display: Counseling provided on symptom management, end of life decisions, and palliation (dem)
Patient offered assistance in planning for end of life issues (als)
Patient offered assistance with end of life issues or existing end of life plan was reviewed or updated during the measurement period

Counseling and discussion regarding advance directives or end of life care planning and decisions, with patient and/or surrogate (list separately in addition to code for appropriate evaluation and management service)
